name: Genesis1 (God Simulator)
description:
Did you ever want to create a world?

A world where There are mountains that look like gems, forrests made out of Swords and houses patrolling the area? Well you can even grow patches of will smith.

Instructions:

Choose your options with the mouse

In explore mode: move with w a s d, shift for speeding up

F12 for screenshot, that will be saved in data folder

The "Let there be light" and "Create animal" options take a lot of computation and might freeze the game for some seconds.
